attributes.action: Tell Snap Inc. to remove their latest update on Snapchat for all UK devives
attributes.additional_details: This made the app annoying and disgusting. This update are making people angry and removing friends from their snap. For an example, my friend said, "If people's stories aren't lit, I'm going to block them cuz I'm forced to see them."
attributes.background: Yesterday Snap Inc. released their latest update for their app called Snapchat. Most of the people that got the update hate the new features and especially me. The app is now slower and harder to use especially that the old features are not separate anymore e.g. the stories are with the chat list.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
